rooms.name: Entrance Lobby
rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimalist Scandinavian design and natural light. It acts as a transition from the outdoor area to the interior living spaces.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: The main living area features open-plan Scandinavian furniture, large windows for plenty of natural light, and integrates seamlessly with the dining area. Vastu principles ensure the entrance is aligned with positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room. Designed as a space for family meals with functional, minimalist Scandinavian furniture and natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: A compact yet efficient kitchen designed in Scandinavian style. Optimized layout respects Vastu by placing the cooking area in a favorable direction.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor. It has designated parking for two vehicles with easy access to the home.

rooms.name: Library/Study
rooms.description: A dedicated quiet space for reading and work. Designed with Scandinavian simplicity and ample natural light; arranged in a Vastu-compliant direction.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: A small guest toilet located near the entrance lobby for convenience.

openings.description: Large window designed for natural light and Vastu alignment.
Functional window for ventilation and light.
Provides ample natural light and adheres to Vastu guidelines for study spaces.
